CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Filtered by Quality Inspection stage positioned above or below the Delivered to Retail stage?
SRP.A: The Filtered by Quality Inspection stage is positioned {above} the Delivered to Retail stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Post-Harvest?
VE.A: The value of stage Post-Harvest is {9594}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Post-Processing?
VE.A: The value of stage Post-Processing is {7044}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Total Harvested Crop, with a value of {12782}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Purchased by Consumers, with a value of {2733}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Post-Harvest to stage Post-Processing?
SC.A: Decreased by {2550} Tons from stage Post-Harvest to stage Post-Processing.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Post-Processing to stage Filtered by Quality Inspection?
SC.A: Decreased by {1595} Tons from stage Post-Processing to stage Filtered by Quality Inspection.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Packaged for Distribution to stage Delivered to Retail?
SC.A: Decreased by {1} Tons from stage Packaged for Distribution to stage Delivered to Retail.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 8319? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Total Harvested Crop} stage has {12782}, the {Post-Harvest} stage has {9594}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 4314? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Packaged for Distribution} stage has {3180}, the {Delivered to Retail} stage has {3179}, the {Purchased by Consumers} stage has {2733}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 3179 and 6246? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Filtered by Quality Inspection} stage has {5449}, the {Packaged for Distribution} stage has {3180}, the {Delivered to Retail} stage has {3179}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Packaged for Distribution to Delivered to Retail, or from stage Post-Processing to Filtered by Quality Inspection?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Post-Processing} to {Filtered by Quality Inspection} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Packaged for Distribution to Delivered to Retail, from stage Post-Harvest to Post-Processing, or from stage Delivered to Retail to Purchased by Consumers?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Post-Harvest} to stage {Post-Processing} is the greatest.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Total Harvested Crop to Post-Harvest, from stage Post-Processing to Filtered by Quality Inspection, or from stage Filtered by Quality Inspection to Packaged for Distribution?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Total Harvested Crop} to stage {Post-Harvest} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Total Harvested Crop} and {Post-Harvest} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Packaged for Distribution} and {Delivered to Retail} stages.
